# Introduction

Welcome to the **lmeSCED** package user manual. This package provides functions to fit linear mixed effects models tailored for Single-Case Experimental Designs (SCED) data, with options to account for AR(1) correlation structures.

# Installation

```R
install.packages("lmeSCED")
